title: Samsung SmartThings Water Leak Sensor
description:
Samsung SmartThings Water Leak Sensor - F-WTR-US-2

By placing this wireless sensor in areas of your home that are prone to water leakage (such as a basement, near a water heater, under an old pipe, or in a bathroom), you can receive an immediate alert on your smartphone at the first sign of excess moisture and prevent a minor headache from causing major damage.

Key Features:

Get an Immediate Alert on Your Smartphone at the First Sign of Excess Water
Provides Peace Of Mind By Notifying You Before Water Damage And Flooding
Place Sensor Under Sink, In Basement, In Vacation Home- Wherever Water Is A Risk.

Features:

Excess Water Notifications:
Get an immediate alert on your smartphone at the first sign of excess water.

Water Detection:
Trigger a light or siren to turn on to alert you if water is detected where it doesn't belong

Monitor Your Sump Pump:
Place the sensor beside the sump pump in your basement to be notified if the sump pump fails.

Specifications:

Design:
Color: White
Finish: White
Material: Plastic
Communication Features

Protocols: ZigBee
Range (ft.): 50-150 (Dependent on home's construction)

Power Source
Source: Battery
Battery Count & Type: CR-2, 1-count

Certification
Certification: UL Listed

Operating
Requirements: Samsung SmartThings hub
Location: Indoor use only
Temperature (Degrees F): 32°- 104°
Battery Life: Up to 2-3 Years

What's Included:
1 Samsung SmartThings Water Leak Sensor
1 CR-2 Battery

Approximate Weight:
Shipping: 1 lb

Approximate Dimensions:
Width: 2.3"
Height: 0.9"
Depth: 1.5"

Warranty Information:
Manufacturer Warranty (authorized online retailer): 1 Year Parts & Labor
